attributes.action: Do not allow Donald Trump to address parliament on his state visit in June 2019
attributes.additional_details:
UK MoD Global Strategic Trends Report:  https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/771309/Global_Strategic_Trends_-_The_Future_Starts_Today.pdf

Wikipedia article (with many references) about Trump's environmental policies - climate change section:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Environmental_policy_of_the_Donald_Trump_administration#Climate_change
attributes.background: Donald Trump denies climate change and withdrew from the Paris Climate Agreement. The UK Ministry of Defence places climate change among the highest threats to defence and security. Despite Trump's climate policies, he is being honoured with a state visit. Do not allow him to address our parliament.
